title: Sri Lanka restrict India to 132
snippet: By Rex Clementine India were forced to hand debut caps to four players for the second T-20 International at RPS yesterday after nearly half their squad were forced to isolate with Kunal Pandya testing positive for COVID.

title: 2nd T20I: Depleted India go down to Sri Lanka by 4 wickets (Ld)
snippet: A below-strength India, who were forced to make seven changes in the XI after nine players were ruled out due to Covid-related issues, stretched Sri Lanka before losing by four wickets in the last over of the second T20 International here on Wednesday night.

title: Sri Lanka lay bare the batting frailties of India
snippet: In this forced batting imbalance, Sri Lanka found their first leap towards series parity. Dasun Shanaka could barely hide his delight at winning another toss, and in went the visiting side to bat first,

title: VIDEO: Sanju Samson falls to freak dismissal, Rahul Chahar takes stunning catch in India vs Sri Lanka 2nd T20I
snippet: Sanju Samson's freak dismissal and Rahul Chahar's amazing catch at the boundary were one of the highlights for India in the 2nd T20I against Sri Lanka, which they lost.

title: India vs Sri Lanka: 'We'Ve Got Eleven To Choose from and all Eleven are Playing'-Rahul Dravid Describes India's Dilemma
snippet: India coach Rahul Dravid found himself in a tricky situation on the eve of the second T20I in Colombo. With Krunal Pandya ruled out and his eight close contact ruled out due to Covid, the management were left with a different set of players to choose from.

title: Online posts mistakenly identify fire walker as Sri Lanka's finance minister
snippet: Social media users in Sri Lanka have shared an image that they claim shows the island nation's finance minister performing a fire walking ritual. The claim is misleading: the image actually shows a local police officer,

title: India vs Sri Lanka: There's No Pressure on Them, We Will Give Them Free Hand: Paras Mhambrey Backs Team India's Debutants
snippet: Colombo: India bowling coach Paras Mhambrey has backed Ruturaj Gaikwad and Devdutt Padikkal to come good in the next match, saying there is no pressure on them and the team management will give the batting duo a free hand.

title: India vs Sri Lanka 2021: In Pics-Sri Lanka Level Series Against Depleted India
snippet: Dhananjaya de Silva shone with the bat as Sri Lanka beat India by four wickets in the second Twenty20 international in Colombo on Wednesday to level the three-match series. Chasing a modest 133, Sri Lanka found themselves in trouble at 105-6,

title: Sri Lanka beat depleted India by 4 wickets to keep series alive
snippet: A depleted Indian team, playing with only five batsmen, could not defend a modest target of 133 despite a valiant effort from its players as Sri Lanka kept the three-match series alive with a four-wicket victory in the second T20 International here on Wednesday.

title: Woman arrested with Rs. 6,000 mn transaction in bank accounts during 4 yrs
snippet: The CID has arrested a 41-year old woman from Dehiwala under the Money Laundering Act for maintaining five bank accounts in which she had transactions up to a staggering Rs. 6,000 million which suspected to have been earned from drugs trafficking

title: New unit to monitor child phonography: Over 17,000 videos, pictures uploaded to cyberspace since last month
snippet: More than 17,000 video clips and photographs related to child phonography have been uploaded to the cyberspace from Sri Lanka through various devices since June 17 to July 28 this year.

title: Sri Lankan government rejects teachers' wage demand
snippet: The unions are once again preparing to betray the teachers' struggle following more empty promises from the government about "ending salary anomalies."

title: Vaccine card to be made compulsory for inter-provincial travel from August 1: LPBOA
snippet: The Lanka Private Bus Owners’ Association (LPBOA) has decided to make COVID vaccine cards compulsory for inter provincial travelling from August 1.

title: India vs Sri Lanka: Watch-Rahul Chahar Gives Wanindu Hasaranga a Send Off; Sri Lankan's Response Wins Hearts
snippet: Fans praised Sri Lanka spinner Wanindu Hasaranga for upholding the sporting spirit even as he was given a send off by Rahul Chahar on his way out during the second T20I in Colombo. India managed to post a low total of 132 runs on the board and was failing to get regular dismissals as they tried to defend the total.

title: India vs Sri Lanka: Proud Of My Boys For Good Fight, Says Shikhar Dhawan
snippet: India's stand-in captain Shikhar Dhawan said that he is proud of his team for putting up a brilliant effort in the second T20I against Sri Lanka after facing adverse circumstances. India captain Shikhar Dhawan was proud of his team for putting up a good fight despite faced with adverse circumstances as they lost the low-scoring second T20 International against Sri Lanka,

title: India Predicted XI for 3rd T20I against Sri Lanka: Another debut likely as Shikhar Dhawan and Co gear up for decider
snippet: To power the bench strength, all the five net bowlers have been inducted into the squad and there are chances of another uncapped player making his international debut tonight.

title: IND vs SL 2021: "Sri Lanka tactically outsmarted India, slow pitch was to their advantage" - Ramiz Raja
snippet: Former Pakistan captain Ramiz Raja has opined that Sri Lanka got the better of India in the second T20I courtesy their tactical brilliance, which caught the visitors off-guard. Raja stated that Sri Lanka prepared a slow pitch that worked to their advantage and exposed the weaknesses in India's batting lineup.

title: Sri Lanka hold nerve to sink depleted India in low-scoring thriller
snippet: Dhananjaya de Silva shone with the bat as Sri Lanka beat India by four wickets in the second Twenty20 international in Colombo

title: Second T20I: Sri Lanka beat India in by 4 wickets, level series 1-1
snippet: Colombo/UNI: Sri Lanka defeated India by four wickets in the second T20I to level the three-match series 1-1, here on Wednesday.

title: India vs Sri Lanka: Kuldeep is extremely talented and a very thinking bowler, says Mhambrey
snippet: With Krunal Pandya testing COVID-19 positive, seven players had to isolate as close contacts and that saw India handing debuts to the likes of Ruturaj Gaikwad.

title: India vs Sri Lanka: There's No Pressure on Them, We Will Give Them Free Hand: Paras Mhambrey Backs Team India's Debutants
snippet: With Krunal Pandya testing positive for COVID-19 and subsequently eight of his close contacts put in isolation, there was a lot of uncertainty over whether the second game would go ahead or not.

title: Emirates suspends flights from India, Pakistan, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka until August 7
snippet: Emirates will be suspending the carriage of passengers from India, Bangladesh, Pakistan and Sri Lanka to Dubai until August 7.
